description.zh-cn: 西汉时期的大臣，先后侍奉汉文帝和汉景帝，以直言敢谏而闻名。
description.en: A minister of the Western Han dynasty who served Emperor Wen and Emperor Jing, known for his outspokenness.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第五位皇帝。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第六位皇帝，汉文帝之子。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Western Han dynasty, son of Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 袁盎的兄长。
description.en: The elder brother of Yuan Ang.

description.zh-cn: 西汉吕氏外戚集团的成员。
description.en: A member of the Lü clan consort kin group in the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉开国功臣，官至太尉、丞相，曾参与平定诸吕之乱。
description.en: A founding general of the Western Han dynasty who served as Grand Marshal and Chancellor, and participated in suppressing the Lü Clan Disturbance.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的皇后，汉惠帝之母。高祖死后，她临朝称制，实行吕氏专权。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Gaozu of Han and mother of Emperor Hui. After Gaozu's death, she ruled as regent and established the authority of her clan.

description.zh-cn: 吕后死后，以周勃、陈平为首的功臣集团与刘氏皇族联合起来，铲除吕氏外戚势力的政治事件。
description.en: A political event after Empress Lü's death, where a coalition of meritorious officials led by Zhou Bo and Chen Ping, along with the Liu imperial clan, eliminated the power of the Lü consort kin.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦之子，汉文帝异母弟，封为淮南王。
description.en: Son of Emperor Gaozu of Han, half-brother of Emperor Wen, and enfeoffed as the King of Huainan.

description.zh-cn: 西汉开国功臣，深受吕后信任。
description.en: A founding general of the Western Han dynasty who was deeply trusted by Empress Lü.

description.zh-cn: 西汉丞相。
description.en: Chancellor of the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝的宠妾。
description.en: A favored concubine of Emperor Wen of Han.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝的皇后，汉景帝的母亲。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Wen of Han and mother of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的宠妃，后被吕后残忍杀害。
description.en: A favored consort of Emperor Gaozu of Han, who was later brutally killed by Empress Lü.

description.zh-cn: 袁盎的侄子。
description.en: The nephew of Yuan Ang.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期的一个诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal kingdom during the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期的一个诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal kingdom during the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉吴王，七国之乱的发动者。
description.en: King of Wu during the Western Han dynasty and the instigator of the Rebellion of the Seven States.

description.zh-cn: 西汉丞相。
description.en: Chancellor of the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉政治家，景帝时任御史大夫，力主削藩。
description.en: A statesman of the Western Han dynasty who served as Imperial Counselor under Emperor Jing and strongly advocated for reducing the power of the vassal lords.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝时期，以吴王刘濞为首的七个刘姓宗室诸侯国因反对削藩而发动的叛乱。
description.en: A rebellion during the reign of Emperor Jing, initiated by seven vassal kingdoms of the Liu imperial clan, led by Liu Pi, the King of Wu, in opposition to the policy of reducing the size of their fiefdoms.

description.zh-cn: 西汉外戚，窦太后侄。
description.en: A member of the consort kin in the Western Han dynasty, nephew of Empress Dowager Dou.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝次子，汉景帝同母弟，封为梁王。
description.en: The second son of Emperor Wen, full brother of Emperor Jing, and enfeoffed as the King of Liang.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期的著名游侠。
description.en: A famous knight-errant during the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期的著名游侠。
description.en: A famous knight-errant during the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继秦朝之后的大一统王朝，与东汉统称为汉朝。
description.en: A unified dynasty in Chinese history following the Qin dynasty, collectively known as the Han dynasty along with the Eastern Han.

description.zh-cn: 西汉宗室，广川王，以盗墓闻名。
description.en: A member of the Western Han imperial clan, King of Guangchuan, known for tomb raiding.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期的一个诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal kingdom during the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 袁哙是袁盎的兄长。
description.en: Yuan Kuai was the elder brother of Yuan Ang.

description.zh-cn: 袁盎起初为吕禄的舍人。
description.en: Yuan Ang initially served as a retainer for Lü Lu.

description.zh-cn: 在汉文帝即位后，袁哙举荐其弟袁盎进入朝廷任职。
description.en: After Emperor Wen ascended the throne, Yuan Kuai recommended his younger brother Yuan Ang to serve in the imperial court.

position.en: Palace Gentleman, Commander of the Gentlemen of the Palace, Commandant, Chancellor of a kingdom

description.zh-cn: 袁盎在西汉朝廷中担任过郎中、中郎将、陇西都尉、齐国国相、吴国国相、楚国国相等多个职位。
description.en: Yuan Ang held multiple positions in the Western Han court, including Palace Gentleman, Commander of the Gentlemen of the Palace, Commandant of Longxi, Chancellor of the Kingdom of Qi, Chancellor of the Kingdom of Wu, and Chancellor of the Kingdom of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 向汉文帝进谏，批评周勃身为功臣而骄横，导致汉文帝对周勃态度变得严肃，周勃因此收敛。
description.en: He advised Emperor Wen, criticizing Zhou Bo for being arrogant despite his merits, which led the emperor to treat Zhou Bo more sternly, causing Zhou Bo to restrain his behavior.

description.zh-cn: 因袁盎在汉文帝面前批评自己，周勃对袁盎心生怨恨。
description.en: Zhou Bo resented Yuan Ang for criticizing him in front of Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 在周勃被诬告谋反入狱后，袁盎是唯一出面为他澄清辩护的大臣。
description.en: After Zhou Bo was falsely accused of rebellion and imprisoned, Yuan Ang was the only high-ranking official to speak out and defend his innocence.

description.zh-cn: 周勃出狱后，感念袁盎的帮助，两人结为挚友。
description.en: After being released from prison, Zhou Bo was grateful for Yuan Ang's help, and the two became close friends.

description.zh-cn: 在吕后死后，周勃作为功臣集团的核心人物，掌握兵权，成功平定吕氏外戚势力。
description.en: After Empress Lü's death, Zhou Bo, as a key figure of the meritorious officials' faction, held military power and successfully suppressed the Lü consort kin's forces.

description.zh-cn: 为母报仇，杀死了辟阳侯审食其。
description.en: To avenge his mother, he killed Shen Shiqi, the Marquis of Piyang.

description.zh-cn: 在刘长谋反案中，未听从群臣处死的建议，仅废其王爵并发配蜀郡，最终导致其在途中自杀。
description.en: In the case of Liu Chang's rebellion, Emperor Wen did not follow the ministers' advice to execute him, but only stripped him of his royal title and exiled him to Shu Commandery, which ultimately led to his suicide en route.

description.zh-cn: 为维护皇后作为正室的尊严，阻止了汉文帝的爱妾慎夫人与帝后同席而坐。
description.en: To uphold the dignity of the empress as the principal wife, he prevented Emperor Wen's favored concubine, Lady Shen, from sitting at the same level as the emperor and empress.

description.zh-cn: 在理解袁盎维护礼法的用意后，赐给袁盎金五十斤。
description.en: After understanding Yuan Ang's intention to uphold the proper rites, she rewarded him with fifty catties of gold.

description.zh-cn: 将汉高祖的宠妃戚夫人虐待致死。
description.en: She tortured Emperor Gaozu's favored consort, Lady Qi, to death.

description.zh-cn: 在霸陵劝阻汉文帝从陡坡策马而下的冒险行为，强调君主不应心存侥幸。
description.en: At Baling, he dissuaded Emperor Wen from the risky act of riding his carriage down a steep slope, emphasizing that a wise ruler should not take unnecessary risks.

description.zh-cn: 袁盎与晁错政见不合，关系不睦。
description.en: Yuan Ang and Chao Cuo had political disagreements and a poor relationship.

description.zh-cn: 晁错与袁盎政见不合，关系不睦。
description.en: Chao Cuo and Yuan Ang had political disagreements and a poor relationship.

description.zh-cn: 弹劾袁盎曾收受吴王刘濞的贿赂，导致袁盎被景帝废为庶人。
description.en: He impeached Yuan Ang for allegedly accepting bribes from Liu Pi, the King of Wu, which led to Emperor Jing demoting Yuan Ang to a commoner.

description.zh-cn: 帮助被废为庶人的袁盎获得了面见汉景帝的机会，以劝说景帝。
description.en: He helped Yuan Ang, who had been demoted to a commoner, to get an audience with Emperor Jing to persuade him.

description.zh-cn: 在七国之乱时，力劝汉景帝处死晁错以平息叛乱。
description.en: During the Rebellion of the Seven States, he strongly urged Emperor Jing to execute Chao Cuo in order to quell the rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 听从袁盎的建议，为平定七国之乱而下令将晁错腰斩。
description.en: Following Yuan Ang's advice, he ordered Chao Cuo to be executed by cutting at the waist to suppress the Rebellion of the Seven States.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要发起者，联合其他六个诸侯国发动了旨在反对朝廷削藩政策的七国之乱。
description.en: As the main instigator, he allied with six other vassal states to launch the Rebellion of the Seven States against the imperial court's policy of reducing fiefdoms.

description.zh-cn: 反对汉景帝立其弟梁王刘武为皇储。
description.en: He opposed Emperor Jing's intention to make his younger brother, Liu Wu, the King of Liang, the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 因袁盎反对其成为皇储而怀恨在心，派遣刺客在安陵将其刺杀。
description.en: Resenting Yuan Ang for opposing his bid to become crown prince, he dispatched assassins who killed Yuan Ang in Anling.

description.zh-cn: 袁盎与当代著名游侠剧孟有交往。
description.en: Yuan Ang associated with the famous contemporary knight-errant Ju Meng.

description.zh-cn: 袁盎与当代著名游侠季心有交往。
description.en: Yuan Ang associated with the famous contemporary knight-errant Ji Xin.

description.zh-cn: 盗掘了袁盎的墓。
description.en: He robbed the tomb of Yuan Ang.

description.zh-cn: 袁种是袁盎的侄子。
description.en: Yuan Zhong was the nephew of Yuan Ang.
